Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Samantha's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Samantha joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . Samantha is killed when the Wolves invade Alexandria and start ransacking houses and murdering residents. The next day, Samantha's body is gathered by Tobin and Bruce and buried along with the other slain Alexandrians. Her name is then added to the memorial wall by Betsy and two other women .
Death[]: Killed By Aaron (Indirectly Caused) Aaron leaves his backpack at Del Arno Foods, which causes the Wolves to locate and attack Alexandria. The Wolves As the Wolves make their way into Alexandria, Samantha is one of the many residents to be killed. Alexandria Resident (Zombified) Later, she is put down by an Alexandria resident after reanimation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Samantha has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Trivia[]: Similar to how the recurring extras killed off in "JSS" got their names, many of the stunt people who portrayed Alexandrians killed by the Wolves were named based off the first letter of their real name, such as Samantha and Sierra Laird.
